original: Lindfors, Olof Verner, civilingenjör, Norrköping, f. 22/6/83 i Hudiksvall av Olof Werner L. o. Johanna Helena Wahlström. G. 22 m. Anna Ljung-qvist. Barn: Ulla f. 23. — Utex. fr. CTL (M) 04. Anst. v. Arbrå Mek. Verkst. 04-05, ASEA 05-11, Canadian Westinghouse Co. 11-17, Internat. Nickel Co., Copper Cliff., Ont., Canada, 18, ASEA anläggn:avd. 19-21 o. 23-24, Rydboholms A-B i Viskafors 22-23, driftsing. v. Norrköp. Bomullsväx^ A-B 25.
translated: Lindfors, Olof Verner, engineer, Norrköping, b. 22/6/83 in Hudiksvall to Olof Werner L. and Johanna Helena Wahlström. Married in 1922 to Anna Ljungqvist. Children: Ulla, b. 1923. Graduated from CTL (M) in 1904. Employed at Arbrå Mek. Verkst. from 1904-1905, ASEA from 1905-1911, Canadian Westinghouse Co. from 1911-1917, Internat. Nickel Co., Copper Cliff., Ont., Canada in 1918, ASEA plant division from 1919-1921 and 1923-1924, Rydboholms A-B in Viskafors from 1922-1923, works engineer at Norrköp. Bomullsväx A-B in 1925.

employmentHistory.roleName: Internat. Nickel Co., Copper Cliff., Ont., Canada
